website_summaries.verdict: This attractive country style three-tier plant stand features an ornate apple branch motif.
pros: Stands out for its solid wrought iron construction
Can hold three separate plant pots
Would look ideal in contemporary or traditional homes alike
cons: Only suitable for 6-inch pots and smaller

customer_reviews.title: Really cute, but beware of the size
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before I purchased it, but didn't quite comprehend how small it really was. It is really cute, but NOT a good purchase if it want it for displaying wide pots. Purchase this for 6" pots or less. Just be informed.
customer_reviews.author: C. from AR

customer_reviews.title: Love it so I bought another one!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy plant stand. I was so satisfied I ordered another one. It is heavy like wrought iron and the place where the plants sit is not going to bend. The circles are almost 8 1/2 inches in diameter and easily hold a six inch pot. I love the airy look.
customer_reviews.author: Mom On The Range

customer_reviews.title: Small but nice
customer_reviews.text: The stand came in today along with some pots we ordered. Very small plant stand but as you can see we put a larger pot on the top a small pot on the side and a medium size on the lower lever so it works just fine. Perfect for a small area and not having to assemble anything was even better. Wife liked the stand. After reading some of the poor reviews was not sure I made a good purchase but as it turns out it was just about perfect for our use.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This plant stand is absolutely perfect! I wanted a stand to add some height to the flowers on my balcony and this is perfect. It’s sturdy and folds up for easy storage. I like that I can adjust the width, placement of the legs. One reviewer said the item is flawed because the platforms overlap and you can’t use the full width of them, but I haven’t had that problem, perhaps because I have mine widened out at the base. Anyway, I love it. I’ve received a ton of compliments and couldn’t be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tips easily
customer_reviews.text: I like this plant stand okay, but you have to always remember that it moves. Twice my maid has broken the pots that I keep on it trying to move it while she was cleaning the floor. It's really easy to tip over. It is a nice looking stand and I like it but if you have a dog or cat for small children if it's bumped at all it is going to swivel out and your plants are probably going to hit the floor
customer_reviews.author: JordanaHayes

customer_reviews.title: As pretty as the picture
customer_reviews.text: Got one of these for Dad for his birthday, and was a bit worried about whether it would be as attractive and sturdy as it looks in the pictures -- reviews of some of these plant stands talk about loose hardware and cheap metal. This one came fully assembled, painted as shown, and seems rock-solid. Dad loved it. Do note the size -- it's hard to tell from the photos, but it's not overly large -- just a couple of feet tall with stands that can hold about a 6" inch pot. But it's good-looking and appears well-made, which is all I needed. Dad was very pleased and said it one he'd had his eye on already.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando J.

customer_reviews.title: FITS RIGHT IN - AuntyPasto says 👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble: just open, it’s set✅ It’s Sturdy: Holds 3 heavy plants✅ It’s lightweight: yes, extremely✅ I have 2 huge Christmas cactus on this stand. On the top and bottom spots. They’re so huge the cover the middle spot so I’m not using that one. It’s a pretty stand, so after the holidays I may buy something else for the cacti and put 3 smaller plants in this one so that it’s beauty can also be seen or another one of same and put on other side each topped with a cactus and something else on the other 2 shelves. I saw the arch style that’d look nice in-between as well.
customer_reviews.author: Aunty Pasto

customer_reviews.title: Nice office planter!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I decided to get this for my home office. It is very nice looking and works well in front of my window. I does hold 3 plants, but when you open it all the way, which I did, you will see that each shelf slightly overlaps the other shelf. That being said, you cannot put a plant on the the bottom 2 shelves that take up all the circular space. Only the top one is fully available. As others have done, I had to use smaller potted plants, or leave them slightly off center. Still works for me, as it keeps them off the floor and it is a nice looking planter.
customer_reviews.author: J. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: does not lock in place so plants fall off easily.
customer_reviews.text: not as tall as it appears in picture, does not lock in place so plants fall off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Piola C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I love this little stand
customer_reviews.text: I love this little stand. I found it to be sturdy. And if you decide you don't want to use it right now, it folds into itself. Great for storing. Perfect for the location we had planned to put it. We needed something to put our ivy plants on because the sun was burning them up. Since the ivy is so full, we only managed to use two pot holders. But that's ok. When it cools down, the ivy will go back outside and we will put three plants on it. Honestly I'm considering ordering another one. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Bixler

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but could use some improvements
customer_reviews.text: I like the stand and it works well for my intended use. The only thing that bothers me is that you see the back of the floral decoration on the lower level, which is not colored, just the back, and since it faces to the front...annoys the ——out of me. How hard would it be to decorate both sizes? There is no way to position it so that an undecorated side isn’t facing out!
customer_reviews.author: G. Snowdon

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on my deck
customer_reviews.text: It comes assembled. Just swing the different levels apart. I expected it to be taller than it is. However, there was no info on the buying sight so I shouldn't be surprised. It is perfect for 3 small pots. It is quite attractive.
customer_reviews.author: J Joy S

customer_reviews.title: The Flower Designs are one-sided
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 5 stars, but the flower designs are one-sided, so you don't see them equally no matter which wayy ou place the stand. I can live with this with disappointment. If you can handle that imperfection, it is a great stand for a patio, particularly apartment-sized patio or balcony.
customer_reviews.author: Addicted To Amazon

customer_reviews.title: It’s so small
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pretty stand but my biggest problem with it is the fact that it easily closes. It opens easily but there is nothing to keep it from closing and losing balance. It’s much smaller than I thought and not happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Huerta

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this plant stabd as you have no way to keep it from collapsing if you need to move it once assembled. You have to pay to return. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: diamondgirl

customer_reviews.title: pretty, but not for a house with animals
customer_reviews.text: I like this plant stand, but it easily gets bumped by my dog and cat and when it gets bumped plants go flying.
customer_reviews.author: Marykatherine Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Poor functionality.
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but deceiving for functionality. Falls over very easy and you must use extremely small plants because shelves are too close together. Would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice - Unique and Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this item. It is very sturdy, but has design flaws when it comes to balance. You really have to be careful how you place your plants (i.e heavy on the bottom). It is best to put this against a wall as it can sometimes be knocked over if the wind is too strong. The leaves are only painted in the front, so you will have to angle it just like the picture to enjoy the art. Overall a very nice product and way better quality and cost than what you would find at local big stores (i.e. HD, Lowes, Wal).
customer_reviews.author: Alien Evolution

customer_reviews.title: I'm a little bit country, and listen to rock n roll.
customer_reviews.text: I have a balcony with main entry view, so it matters if my display of flowers and furniture are pretty. My neighbors and showing realtors seem happy with the addition of the County Apple Motif Plants Stand ( I've been getting more smiles back when I smile).
customer_reviews.author: Katya S.

customer_reviews.title: smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: smaller than expected, no way to lock legs in place, need to be careful when moving or it folds up and tips over
customer_reviews.author: akvenator

customer_reviews.title: A little shorter than expected
customer_reviews.text: But otherwise an excellent product. Just take it out of the box and unfold it. No assembly required. Wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Vulcaneer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive look, holds up well
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the two I bought for a while now and they have held up well on my terrace. I do wish they locked into position when you open them as it can move if you are not careful. You really can't move the whole thing with plants on them. I have one on the stairs landing out front and have received nice compliments from the neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: Ria Small

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in our hall.
customer_reviews.text: Used to showcase our plants. Must be careful when moving as shelves move easily. Overall a good product for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Stand!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Stand! Works great for our 3 large Boston Ferns from summer - hoping to keep them alive for the winter. Plan on using it on our screened-in veranda this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Leah B.

customer_reviews.title: Not assembled correctly
customer_reviews.text: This is tiny and not made correctly. When its opened up two of the 3 leaves are backwards no matter how its turned. Its can be seen in all the pictures but unfortunately I didn't realize it until it arrived. If I keep it I will need yo paint it because the back of leaves are black and it's odd to me
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Yates

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure if I was going to like this stand but I love it! It is exactly what I needed and looks fantastic in my sunroom!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FUN
customer_reviews.text: It's small, however, it's DOPE Happy, b/c reviews provided herein were very helpful I agree. Nice product for outdoor garden, etc
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Daughter In Law
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Daughter IN Law and she thought the product was an excellent value and worked as expected.
customer_reviews.author: wild dan

customer_reviews.title: Works well in front of window
customer_reviews.text: Hold 3 fairly large pots and is steady,doesn't feel like it will fall over even on carpet,wife likes.
customer_reviews.author: JPFLYONE

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive plant stand
customer_reviews.text: Nice plant stand, but the shelves are not far enough to hold large plant. It was very easy to set up, just unfold.
customer_reviews.author: val

customer_reviews.title: Warning: my observation is that the intermediate rung HAS ...
customer_reviews.text: Warning: my observation is that the intermediate rung HAS TO HAVE the heaviest plant to counter balance the other two. Otherwise the whole thing falls to the ground. No matter how you angle the legs in relation to each other it is a delicate balancing act.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique P Dancourt

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Small & not as high as I expected it to be but good enough for my cattleyas. My pots are heavy so less likely to tip over.
customer_reviews.author: Mae R

customer_reviews.title: Cute plant stands but was extremely disappointed in size
customer_reviews.text: Cute plant stands but was extremely disappointed in size. Would Not ordered if I had known how small it would be..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed, detailed, attractive plant stand
customer_reviews.text: Update - I just purchased this plant stand again as I lost my first one in the Harvey flood last year. I love this plant stand! It is well constructed, detailed and attractive. It fits perfectly into the corner on my patio that needed a plant stand for my Angel Wing begonias. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon1928

customer_reviews.title: Very nice item!
customer_reviews.text: I love it for my coffee cup and my books and even a game, on my patio next to my bench ; it fits right into a small space!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Stancato

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute stand. Just what I needed for the living room. I wish the flat pot spaces had rims so I wouldn't have to worry about the dogs bumping against the stand and knocking the plants off. So far, so good. There is another stand that is just $5 more which does have rims. It's the Panacea 3-Tiered stand. I also ordered that one and I like it better for that reason. Both stands fold if you need to move them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is small
customer_reviews.text: This plant stand is tiny, but it quit, it looks wonderful with small plants. Would recommended.
customer_reviews.author: elena

customer_reviews.title: not what was expected
customer_reviews.text: very cheaply made not what was expected, only put small light plants on it
customer_reviews.author: John Roudebush

customer_reviews.title: Great plant stand
customer_reviews.text: This stand worked out so well we may purchase another. Looks really good.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Easy, well built and attractive for indoor and outdoor use.
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful for my indoor space. All I had to do is open the shipping box and spread the tiers. I’ve ordered an additional stand for a family member who has a small balcony space
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: Looks attractive.
customer_reviews.text: This stand is perfect for our apartment deck. Made well amd looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, fun but a little unstable. Be careful to position your planters well
customer_reviews.author: nanna

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: My fault for not looking closer to the dimensions but picture is bigger then it actually is. It's small so stuck it in a corner with small plants on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ogad

customer_reviews.title: Smaller size
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, but a little smaller than I'd like. I still would recommend highly for smaller plants or for a limited spaced lanai.
customer_reviews.author: Iris ~~ Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Late but good
customer_reviews.text: Came very very very late. But it came as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my orchids!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Sturdy stand for my orchids. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Ns_mom

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable base legs
customer_reviews.text: I like that the shelves can be moved to fit the corner or your preferences. I ordered one, liked it well enough to order another. They frame my living room window nicely, and can be used for things other than plants, too. PROS: Adjustable legs allows for corners. One shelf with a smaller pot on it doubles as a drink holder. CONS: None so far, but it may rust carpet if legs get wet.
customer_reviews.author: Twohalveswilltravel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect plant stand
customer_reviews.text: I love this plant stand. LIke some of the other people who reviewed it, the instructions are very sketchy and not easy to understand. I ended up just looking at it and figuring out how it went together. One little hinge was missing on mine, but I used a zip tie to secure it in place. I figured that was easier than trying to exchange it. It looks great in my window and my plants seem to be very happy on their new perch.
customer_reviews.author: cricket

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cute plant stand! I was afraid it may be too close to the floor but it’s perfect! It’s sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is so beautiful and was amazed when I opened up box.. perfect size for my small apartment which, I was expecting and foldable.. happy with my purchase..
customer_reviews.author: Seema Farhan

customer_reviews.title: Country Apple Plant Stand Shelf
customer_reviews.text: Country Apple Plant Stand Shelf The height of the stand was much lower than I wanted it to be and just a bit cramped with the medium-sized pots that I put on the stand. I was a bit confused about the leaf pattern on the bottom of the stand, the colored leaf pattern was visible from the front on one side and was not on the opposite side. The plant stand was light, which was a plus and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: brickhouse

customer_reviews.title: Plants are happy
customer_reviews.text: Limited light sources in my office and this easily holds 3 Christmas cactus where the light is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Grubbs-Weiss

customer_reviews.title: The height is perfect for our patio
customer_reviews.text: I now have two of these. We live on the Coast so we are expecting them to rust eventually but I figure at the cost we can spray paint them every year until they completely fall apart. The height is perfect for our patio. The fact that the bottom is open gives ample room for drainage and my plants are off the deck (yippee).
customer_reviews.author: Marilyne Cleeves

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful look. However
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful look. However, when placing plants on all three levels there is a problem. I lifted one plant up to pour off excess water and the entire stand fell over. Was very disappointed and had a mess to clean up. Apparently it is not heavy enough to remain standing when weight is unevenly distributed.
customer_reviews.author: Palpauly

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected but still a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I anticipated, but serves the purpose I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Kelbel

customer_reviews.title: We still have this and some of the decoration faded ...
customer_reviews.text: We still have this and some of the decoration faded but my husband painted it again and looks brand new
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For small plants that do not weigh much.
customer_reviews.text: Ok for a 5 inch pot, but nothing any larger .
customer_reviews.author: Gaylene Smirh

customer_reviews.title: planter
customer_reviews.text: I wrote an earlier review and gave just a 3 star. I realize now that I was hasty. It took longer than I expected but I did not realize at the time that I had placed the order a few days before hurricane Sandy. That is probably why I received it late. Sorry for the quick review, I was just angry at the time, it was a birthday present. Glad to say she loved it. It is a pretty stand. I might order one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: D. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Little smaller and less sturdy than I would've liked, but still happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and attractive
customer_reviews.text: As a lightweight but sturdy 3-plant stand with no assembly required, this is a great buy. We are certainly enjoying ours!
customer_reviews.author: M.H.

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I have three orchids on my lake ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I have three orchids on my lake view balcony and I placed my three orchids on this table, they are different colors and create a beautiful contrast against the lake with one orchid higher than the other. I truly love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette Perez

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded My Expectations! So Very Pretty
customer_reviews.text: This plant stand is absolutely perfect for the space it was intended for. The color and vine design were an absolutely pleasant surprise sine I did not notice it when ordering. I am thinking I may need another for my bathroom beside the tub for candles and bath salts. It is that pretty. Packaging was well done and it arrived in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: January

customer_reviews.title: Nice plant stand for deck flowers!
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition for my deck, like the three tier height for clustering blooming flowers around the fountain.
customer_reviews.author: laular2

customer_reviews.title: Plant holder
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I put my plants on it to display them
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Work of art
customer_reviews.text: A work of art. Have it in my foyer and it's just perfect. It's become a conversation piece for guests. The craftsmanship again is a work of art. I have a heavy flowers pot on the center rung and two smaller pots to the left and right. This was great for balancing. That's why I only gave 4 starts. It looks great and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: DRE'A

customer_reviews.title: Plant stand
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in a corner . Will hold three small plants
customer_reviews.author: Starsy

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up. No assembly tequired. Very cute and sturdy plant stand.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Logan

customer_reviews.title: Great little plant stand
customer_reviews.text: Love this plant stand. It fits in front of the sliding door in my kitchen, so it gets lots of light.
customer_reviews.author: toto

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty but I'd hoped to use this for an outdoor ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty but I'd hoped to use this for an outdoor patio and it is far too lightweight for that and blows over in anything more than a slight breeze. I finally gave up and will use it indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This plant stand was absolutely perfect for what I wanted and look so cute
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Well packaged. No assembly. Just took right out of the box and placed on floor. Very satisfied.Delivered as promised
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and stable
customer_reviews.text: No problems with quality. Sturdy and stable. Be aware of the size and layout. This is not for your three bushy shrubs in giant pots, and larger sprawling plants will overlap and compete for space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's the perfect size, and it's holding my bonsai trees very ...
customer_reviews.text: it's the perfect size, and it's holding my bonsai trees very nicely! it's strong, and just as pictured! would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and well made! No assembly which I appreciated. Holds up to about 1 gallon size plants per side. Petite overall but perfect for what I'm using it for.
customer_reviews.author: Bluejaytx

customer_reviews.title: ... small based potted plants but otherwise has been a nice additon to our
customer_reviews.text: Only will fit small based potted plants but otherwise has been a nice additon to our deck
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Jo Thompson

customer_reviews.title: I have two now!
customer_reviews.text: Good Stand! In summer I have it outside (another stand I bought long time ago) and in winter indoors in the kitchen with plants cannot survive outdoors. It is sturdy and did not rust. It comes already mounted that is a plus, no assembly needed.
customer_reviews.author: chanchota

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough for heavy ceramic pots
customer_reviews.text: Our stand opened just as pictured. Placed three fairly heavy ceramic pots with flowers on this stand on the patio. Looks great and no rust where we hose off the bricks underneath. The uncolored backs of the apple and leaf motif are not noticeable. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Carol A.

customer_reviews.title: I like it, just would it prefer that the round ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it , just would it prefer that the round tray on top would it be a little more wider in dimension .
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This plant stand came very quickly and is very compact. The legs swivel out so you can place them in whatever position you would like. I use four to six inch pots and they fit great. It's sitting in my front window, a sliding glass door and it fits perfectly. It's light weight and not too big and not too small. For me it's exactly what I wanted. Very cute too! And for the price you just can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Cat

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: This is cute, it is small as others have said, but I expected that. It is a little wobbly though so its best to make sure you balance the pots to minimize the wobble. It makes a very lovely decorative touch to your lanai, porch, or front door area.
customer_reviews.author: Jen&Phil

customer_reviews.title: Way too short for plants to get sufficient light.
customer_reviews.text: Unless you position this on a table or have windows that are low to the ground, your plants can't get sufficient light on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Tate

customer_reviews.title: Nice outdoor/indoor plant stand
customer_reviews.text: Nice outdoor/indoor plant stand. It fills a corner I wanted to disguise with plants very nicely. It's sturdy and attractive. I am thinking of buying one for my sister.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle reader

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I have several plants and this perfect. Not the heavy type metal a little flimsy but it still worked. Perfect size
customer_reviews.author: Maribel

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice at my patio window hold all 3 plants very pleased with this stand
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Schmoyer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. I received damaged stand. some paint was already pilled off.
customer_reviews.author: dmitry

customer_reviews.title: Worst Plant Stand Ever-Update
customer_reviews.text: Worst plant stand ever. If I lay my hand on it, the stand falls over. I certainly cannot put a flower pot on it. The dimensions were listed but it seems to be even smaller. I am trying to return it but so far the Furniture Creations company wants me to pay shipping and a restocking fee for an item that cannot be used by anyone. UPDATE- Furniture Creations promised to give me a refund immediately once they understood the product would not work. Hopefully someone else will receive the product working correctly in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Moore

customer_reviews.title: Just lovely!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase. I bought 2 and put them in my front yard patio. They are the perfect size for what I needed and they look great. They handle average size pots just fine. Just Lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: This is an attractive little planter stand and as long ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive little planter stand and as long as you balance the weight on the legs it can hold three decent sized houseplants.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara E

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: cute - not as large as I would like, but OK for smaller pots.
customer_reviews.author: Marian Kline

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This cart is sturdy and attractive. I am enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Gurganus

customer_reviews.title: Paint and chip marks
customer_reviews.text: There are rust marks and paint chipped off of the one I received. I would have sent it back but I had disposed of the large box it came in. Not happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Jaehne

customer_reviews.title: Country Apple Plant Stand
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged and quick delivery, good seller and service, I like the product but find there is not enough space to put a planter on all three tiers due to incorrect design. I am using it and I do like it a lot. AAA+++
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, packed nicely and no assembly
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these and then ordered 2 more. Nice product, packed nicely and no assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Chirsky

customer_reviews.title: Great little shelves
customer_reviews.text: I use them daily. I have them arranged to hold pots and planters that are probably not supposed to be supported by these little circles, but they hold up very well and when I have to move them remain adjustable. Locking wheels would have made these things even better, but as is they do better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love this stand. Opened and put to use right away.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Twist

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very unstable for plants! It also doesn't open enough to use the middle tier for anything. It tipped over when I put a small plant and made a huge mess. I won't be using it!
customer_reviews.author: Joelle

customer_reviews.title: Chic Plant Stand
customer_reviews.text: This stand is so cute. It holds decent size plants and since it doesn't have an enclosed stand, you are not limited as to the size of the plant you can put on each. The apple design gives it a cute finish.
customer_reviews.author: MiamiLadyLiving

customer_reviews.title: One issue with this product.
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice except for the fact that the center post wasn't made long enough for stability. It was almost an inch shorter than the other legs. Since I'm using it on my deck I was able to put a small disc under it for the needed stability. But if I were using it inside my home, I would have expected it to be uniform.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: Happy with it! It is adjustible which I did not expect. Perfect size and height for my existing pots. It adds beauty in a bare corner. Lovely design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, Sturdy plant holder
customer_reviews.text: I put pots within wooden baskets on it and this becomes the prettiest piece in my living room. Also you can use it for Long Jars with water, arrangements and floating candles, beautiful! Definitely not for the house with younger kids.
customer_reviews.author: la

product_meta.title: Gifts & Decor Country Apple Plant Stand Shelf Holds 3-Flower Pot
product_meta.description: Package Quantity:1| Size:DESIGN 1Put your favorite plants on proud display with this country-style stand. An apple-branch motif adds charm and color to a graceful triple-tier "gate" design. Wrought iron. 19-1/4-inch by 15-1/2-inch by 19 3/4-inch high.
feature_bullets: Country styled plant stand made from wrought iron
Features 3 graduated shelves for the display of plants
Intriguing gate design with an apple branch motif
Suitable for both indoor and outdoor use
Great functional and decorative addition for any setting
